 }
 
+const std::vector<double>& Calculator::getHistory() const {
+    return history_;
+}
+
+void Calculator::printHistory() const {
+    std::cout << "History:" << std::endl;
+    for (size_t i = 0; i < history_.size(); ++i) {
+        std::cout << "  [" << i << "] " << history_[i] << std::endl;
+    }
+}
+
 } // namespace ninja
\ No newline at end of file
